scripts.watch-web: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Generate,Build Common,Start" -c "magenta.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold" "yarn generate" "yarn --cwd common/ watch" "yarn --cwd web/ start"
scripts.watch-app: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Generate,Build Common,Start" -c "magenta.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold" "yarn generate" "yarn --cwd common/ watch" "yarn --cwd app/ start"
scripts.watch-server: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Generate,TypeScript,Node" -c "magenta.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold" "yarn generate" "yarn --cwd server/ watch-ts" "yarn --cwd server/ watch-node"
scripts.watch-server-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Generate,TypeScript,Node" -c "magenta.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold" "yarn generate" "yarn --cwd server/ watch-ts" "yarn --cwd server/ serve-debug"
